column4: what would you do if you spent 3 full days and nights, doing nothing else but trying to get your wireless card working in ubuntu? What would you do if you spent 3 full days and nights looking for help on the issue and not finding it? what would you do? what would you do when your computer is unuseable for 3 days and you don't want to suffer windows again? I need to know.
I cant-take-it-any-longer
no one seems to give a shit (gonna kick me off the channel for saying "shit"? Gonna do that to me too?)
the card works I have NO $ No $. I need this computer - I have to have it working I take online college courses
I have been
for three dayssssss
three daysssssw
5 installs
scroll up
I'm gonna staep away for a moment
there are many channels that have clean language policies and many that do not. There nothing wrong with them kicking you for abusing language in a channel with a clean language policy
I'm sorry but this is completely ludacris
thanks Dr. very helpful - now try putting yourself in my shoes
I have appologized and I was and am sincere about that. I'll take a break and come back but I desparetely need someone to help me with my issue.
Ludicrous is the word that means silly. what you were using was the name of a rap artist
You cant get your wifi card to work?
Are you getting any error messages?
what is the make and model of your card?
lol. Thank you man. Thanks
have you looked up the card in google to see if it is on any of the linux supported  hardware lists?

I can't get it to work. There's a lot to this story but I won't bother you to try to explain it all here. Suffice it to say I have done quite a bit of troubleshooting and believe I have narrowed things down. I'm on the last leg of the race and not sure how to get past this last hurdle.
